Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka winning three out of the last four ODIs against Australia
Australia have been far from their best in the ODI format in the recent past
Sri Lanka are definitely in with a decent chance to achieve victory against them
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Ekana Cricket Stadium was quite good for batting, which allowed South Africa to post a total in excess of 300 on the board
The average first-innings score at this venue, which boasts long boundaries, is 250
The Australian batting lineup has struggled, where the veterans David Warner and Steve Smith are yet to score big runs
The Sri Lankan bowling attack has been trounced all over the park in the initial stage of the flagship tournament
Others: The match between Australia and Sri Lanka is the 14th match of the ODI World Cup 2023
The match is scheduled to take place at the Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow on October 16, 2023
The match is expected to be a competitive one, with Sri Lanka winning three out of the last four ODIs against Australia
